channel.title: Posts on Rimworld Multiplayer
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Rimworld Multiplayer

item.title: Website Online
item.description: We have a sorta-functional website now. Much thanks to PJB, who patiently taught me a whole lot about web design in a very short amount of time.

item.title: Steam Workshop Release
item.description: Patch v.0.4.6 | Protocol 15 Rimworld Multiplayer has finally been released on the Steam Workshop! https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1752864297 We decided to do this a bit earlier then planned because of several reasons A lot of people were having trouble installing the mod Updating the mod will be really easy for everyone Using outdated versions of the mod won’t be a problem anymore The next update of rimworld will break the mod for anyone who doesn’t update
